title: kugamine_tonami
body:
A character mentioned in [[Tsukihime]] and fully appears in [[Kagetsu Tooya]]. 

He is the eldest son of the Kugamine family, a branch family of the Tohnos that harbor the most wealth, making them influential and powerful compared to the other branch subfamilies. He is a [[fat man]] with seemingly little redeemable qualities, including being a pervert and into voyeur photography. He was formerly engaged to [[Tohno Akiha]] as a matter of convenience before it was dissolved. Despite the prior engagement, it seems [[Hisui (tsukihime)|]] is more his type, as he would bother her quite a bit when he lived in the Tohno mansion.

title: stellus_keirich
body:
[b]Takeyama Hoshi[/b] (竹山ほし), born [b]Stellus Keirich[/b], is a character from [[Jo Shin Ogi]]'s [i][[Chronicle of Myers]][/i], appearing in [i]Invasion to Shadowlands[/i], [i]Keirichlied[/i] and [i]Vater des Sterns[/i]. An Austrian-Japanese idol, guitarist and vocalist, she is the daughter of [[Albert Keirich]], and the first LGBTQ+ character in the series. Her alias is Hoshino Taichi (星野太一).

She has a wife, [[Hoshino Ryoko (Chronicle of Myers)|]], both members of the group HOSIBOSI. and parent of [[Hoshino Atsuko (Chronicle of Myers)|]] (later Hoshino Kadosada).

She's first Death Knight character from [i][[Chronicle of Myers]][/i].

[spoilers]Born a man, Stellus was condemned dead at birth, but his father, Albert Keirich, could not bear his death. In order to change the situation, Albert resurrected him with magical music. But it came at a price... the dead Stellus opened his eyes after being resurrected, but the magic had forcibly turned him [[undead|into a woman]].

When trying to tagging Stellus, [[1girl]] is commonly used, but if it is based on gender at birth or soul form, it can be [[1boy]], [[old man]], and [[ghost]].
[/spoilers]

Stellus is inspired in part by [[hoshino aquamarine|Hoshino Aqua]] and [[hoshino ruby|Ruby]] (Aqua: 2/4, Ruby: 2/4, unisex, but idol form is Aqua: 1/4 and Ruby: 3/4), the children of [[Hoshino Ai]] in [[Oshi no Ko]], [[Hoshikawa Lily]] (born gender, but stellus stay on the male identity) in [[Zombie Land Saga]], and [[Darion Mograine]] (both are [[Death Knight]]) in [[World of Warcraft]].

title: hoshino_ryoko_(chronicle_of_myers)
body:
[b]Ryoko Hoshino[/b] is a character from [[Jo Shin Ogi]]'s [[Chronicle of Myers]]. She appears in [i]Invasion to Shadowlands[/i], [i]Keirichlied[/i] and [i]Vater des Sterns[/i]. she is wife of [[Stellus Keirich]].

Ryoko Hoshino's appearance is a reference to [[Kurokawa Akane]] from the manga [[Oshi no Ko]], and her surname is a reference to [[Hoshino Ai (oshi no ko)|]] from [[Oshi no Ko]].

[[Jinan Tokie]] is his daughter.

title: fritz_rumey_(azur_lane)
body:
[[Azur Lane]]'s personification of the planned German Atlantic Large Cruiser Carrier (Grossflugzeugkreuzer) Project II, Fritz Rumey is a hybrid ship that combines features of a large cruiser and an aircraft carrier, she is equipped with battleship-caliber guns, the size of a large cruiser and a flight deck of an aircraft carrier, combined both air power and firepower within.

Her design maybe "inspired from Hildebrand":[https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/blogger_img_proxy/AEn0k_vIJFaEI0aQpLf9GmZDnITwEmrkZ2aAIOsCnjJorrlrf-cf5ER1MBUvkrFDuL_9Kv6bPhHumgwYLBW3lP7m1E0oa3o7Pz25yg8stueGcfUzdr-kxpGjUHiorfQYt-xoPCbWWq_N=w1600] from [[World of Warships]]. Hildebrand is an O-class Large Cruiser that shares design from the Grossflugzeugkreuzer Projekt.

title: mob_cap
body:
A mob cap or mob-cap is a round, gathered, or pleated cloth (usually linen) [[hat]] consisting of a caul to cover the hair, a frilled or ruffled brim, and (often) a [[hat ribbon|ribbon band]] to keep it in place (modern versions use elastic). 

Worn as an indoors hat by married women in the 18th & early 19th century. Depending on the location and era, it was also worn by [[maid]]s as an alternative to the stereotypical maid headdress. During the time period, it was called a [[bonnet]], but is not to be confused with the more general use of the term.  Use this tag in preference to the other when applicable, rather than as a subtype.

Commonly associated with the [[Touhou]] games because of the author's fondness for putting them on many of his more popular, early Windows-era characters.

title: nijisanji_idol_uniform
body:
A standardized concert [[idol clothes|idol uniform]] for [[Nijisanji]], as seen in post #7374894. First introduced in 2021 with the announcement of the [i]Nijisanji 4th Anniversary LIVE 「FANTASIA」[/i] and primarily associated with such large anniversary concerts, though it also gets used at smaller events.

It is mostly white and dark blue/black with [[gold trim]]. Each member's version of the uniform is made from one of six top and one of six bottom parts (three each for boys and girls), with a personalized accent color plus some unique elements (e.g. [[Tsukino Mito]]'s [[rabbit ear headphones]]).

h4. External links

* Official FANTASIA outfit showcase: "Day 1":[https://www.anycolor.co.jp/news/qjea24m_kt], "Day 2":[https://www.anycolor.co.jp/news/yljlr_p09]
* Official SYMPHONIA outfit showcase: "Day 1":[https://www.nijisanji.jp/en/news/dczzvh87flk3], "Day 2":[https://www.nijisanji.jp/news/dbs-4cofx]

body:

Souchou has a [[delinquent]] aesthetic with a removable black and white [[coat]], a [[sarashi]] worn in the style of a [[tube top]], [[pants|white puffy pants]], [[white footwear|white boots]], [[black gloves]], pink [[sword]], [[black-framed eyewear|black-rimmed]] [[glasses]], a [[mole under eye|mole under her left-eye]], and [[long hair|long]] [[two-tone hair]] tied up in a [[spiked hair|spiky]] [[high ponytail]], though she can wear it loose with an [[ahoge]] on top. She is [[tall female|189.3 cm tall]].

title: hololive_idol_uniform_(bright)
body:
The [[official alternate costume|official]] [[idol clothes]] worn by [[hololive]] members for live events and in certain [[promotional art|promotional artworks]] between 2023 and 2025, created for the 2023 4th hololive Festival "Our Bright Parade". The base version of the outfit was designed by [[Amagai Tarou]], while [[Mika Pikazo]] designed a variation for the overseas talents.

Just like with the original idol uniform version and the hololive summer swimsuit, for special events it's not uncommon for the top to be replaced with a [[t-shirt]] featuring the [[logo]] of the event instead.

h4. Versions

h6. hololive Japan version

It consists of a [[white jacket|white]] [[short-sleeved jacket]] with [[puffy short sleeves]], a color-coded [[bowtie]], a [[white shirt]], a blue [[underbust]] [[corset]], a color-coded [[sash]] with a [[waist bow|bow]] running from the waist to the hip, a [[layered skirt|layered]] [[overskirt]] consisting of a and [[white skirt]] and a [[two-sided skirt|two-sided]] layer with [[blue skirt|blue]] on the outside and a color-coded inner layer and a [[large bow|large]] [[back bow|back]][[bow skirt|bow]], worn over either a [[frilled skirt|frilled]] [[blue skirt|blue]] [[miniskirt]] or a pair of [[blue shorts]] with a [[thigh strap]], [[blue socks|blue]] [[bobby socks]] and [[high heel boots|high-heel]] [[winged footwear|winged]] [[ankle boots]] with color-coded soles and wings.

h6. [[hololive English]] version

It consists of a white [[double-breasted]] [[crop top]] with [[uneven sleeves]],  a [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[black skirt|black]] and [[white skirt|white]] [[half-skirt]] with [[crinoline]] worn over a [[black skirt|black]] [[plaid skirt]] with multiple [[bow]]s attached, a black [[thigh strap]], a [[white pantyhose|white]] [[single leg pantyhose]] with a sparkle [[print pantyhose|print]] and [[mismatched footwear]] consisting of a [[white footwear|white]] [[single boot]] on one foot and a color-coded [[strappy heels|strappy heel]] on the other

h6. [[hololive Indonesia]] version

The holoID version replaces the single-piece top with a color-coded [[cropped shirt]] with [[puffy short sleeves]] and [[short over long sleeves]] on one side, the bottom is a color-coded [[overskirt]] worn over either [[multicolored shorts]] with [[thigh strap]]s or a color-coded [[half-skirt]] worn over a [[frilled skirt]], [[mismatched legwear|mismatched]] [[socks]] and [[white footwear|white]] [[sneakers]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #6019666: Reference sheet (hololive Japan)
* !post #6019508: Reference sheet (hololive English)
* !post #6019569: Reference sheet (hololive Indonesia)

h4. See also

* [[hololive idol uniform (Origin)]]
* [[hololive idol uniform (Color Rise)]]
* [[List of hololive official costumes]]

title: hololive_idol_uniform_(origin)
body:
The [[official alternate costume|official]] [[idol clothes]] worn by [[hololive]] members for live events and in certain [[promotional art|promotional artworks]] between 2020 and 2023, originally co-designed by [[Amagai Tarou]] and [[Narumi Nanami]]. The uniform first debuted at the 2020 [[Nonstop Story]] live concert, and has since become the standard outfit for the group's idol activities.

Since new members usually don't receive their idol outfit until several months after debut, artists usually come up with their own interpretations that incorporate elements from their default outfits and may differ from the final official depiction.

h4. Original JP version

It consists of a [[sleeveless]] shirt, a [[layered skirt|layered]] [[white skirt]] [[miniskirt]] in a [[skirt set]], a golden [[belt]] with a small [[white bow|white]] [[bow skirt|bow]] on the hip and a [[large bow]] on the [[back bow|back]], [[white gloves]], [[wrist cuffs]] and [[white footwear|white]] [[boots]]. The only exception to this is AZKi's version of the outfit, which is primarily black instead. The accent colors, legwear, and accessories differ to match each talent's color scheme and personality. The top of the outfit comes in 3 variants:
* The first variation, worn by [[Tokino Sora]], [[AZKi (hololive)|]], [[Hoshimachi Suisei]], [[Shirakami Fubuki]], [[Minato Aqua]], [[Nekomata Okayu]], [[Uruha Rushia]], [[Shiranui Flare]], [[Amane Kanata]], [[Omaru Polka]], [[Momosuzu Nene]] and [[Takane lui]] features a [[white vest]] with a [[bowtie]].
* The second variation, worn by [[Roboco-san]], [[Yozora Mel]], [[Aki Rosenthal]], [[Natsuiro Matsuri]], [[Nakiri Ayame]], [[Yuzuki Choco]], [[Oozora Subaru]], [[Shirogane Noel]], [[Houshou Marine]], [[Kiryu Coco]], [[Tsunomaki Watame]], & [[Shishiro Botan]] features a [[halter shirt]] with a [[navel]] [[navel cutout|cutout]] and an [[armlet]].
* The third variation, worn by [[Sakura Miko]], [[Akai Haato]], [[Murasaki Shion]], [[Ookami Mio]], [[Inugami Korone]], [[Usada Pekora]], [[Tokoyami Towa]], [[Himemori Luna]], & [[Yukihana Lamy]] features a [[corset]] or [[bodice]] with [[frills|frilled]] [[frilled straps|straps]].

h4. 2022 holoFes version

A different "version" of the outfit worn by all members was debuted at the 2022 hololive Super Expo, in which the members wear the official event [[t-shirt]] [[tied shirt|tied]] on top, while retaining their respective skirts and legwear from the regular idol outfit.

h4. Appearance

* !post #3731704: Original version
* !post #5231110: 2022 holoFes version

h4. See also

* [[hololive Idol Uniform (Bright)]] - The idol uniform introduced for the 4th Hololive Festival "Our Bright Future"
* [[hololive Idol Uniform (Color Rise)]] - The idol uniform introduced for the 6th Hololive Festival "Color Rise Harmony"
* [[holoMyth Anniversary outfit]] - The idol uniform worn by [[holoMyth]] during their 2nd anniversary
* [[List of hololive official costumes]]

title: delta_force_(video_game)
body: Delta Force is a FPS video game series originally developed by NovaLogic and now currently owned by TiMi Studio Group. Taking the role as a member of Delta Force, a [[real life]] [[Military Operator|Special Forces]] group of the [[United States Army]], the player is tasked all over the world to battle terrorists, international criminals, rebels and enemy military forces.

title: miura_akane_(2ch)
body:
A fake [[K-On!]] character made by the VIPPERs of [[2channel]] to deceive K-On! fans into believing that she was a real character.

She has a [[ponytail]] with [[pink hair]], and she plays a [[euphonium]]. She is a homeless person living in a park. Her nickname is "デビちゃん" (debi-chan).

Like [[Kasane Teto]] and other VIPPALOIDs, she was made at "架空のけいおん新キャラ作ってけいおん厨釣ろうぜww" (Let's make a fictional new character of K-ON!, and play a trick on K-ON! addicts. LOLLOL) thread. Because a careless member beforehand leaked a secret, the VIPPERs failed to fool people in Japan. However, their hoax somehow succeeded in overseas countries.

The VIPPERs used "安価 (anka)" to make her profile. It is the biggest reason for strange settings of 2ch characters.

h4. Profile

* Name: Miura Akane
* Instrument: Euphonium
* The reason why she chose it: Her parents' recommendation
* Musical instrument performance career : Beginner
* Family structure: A fatherless family (Her father is a mercenary. He is still alive, but is in the foreign countries.)
* Personality: Shy
* Characteristic: Ponytail with pink hair
* Height: 172cm
* Weight: 45kg
* Nickname: Debi-chan
* The reason of her nickname: She resembles [[forehead|Deko]]-bitch (a derogatory nickname of [[Hirano Aya]], or [[Tainaka Ritsu]])
* Measurements: B100, W50, H80 (cm)
* Voice actress: Yaguchi Mari (a newcomer voice actress, foreign to a leader of Morning Musume)
* Grade: The same as Azusa, and she is a transfer student
* Motive for joining light music club: A school store is near to their clubroom
* Favorite music: The TV theme of "Quiz! Hexagon"
* House: A park
* How to go to school: Walking 5km
* Favorite outfit: Anything made of cloth
* Room: A slide in the park
* Favorite food: Anything that the school store disposed of
* Favourite subject: "How to survive"
* Weak subject: Music
* Ability to move: Strongest
* Birthday: February 29
* How to kill time alone: Weeding the park
* What she is afraid of: Locust

h4. See also

* VIPPALOIDs: [[Kasane Teto]], [[Yokune Ruko]], [[Namine Ritsu]]
* VIPPER [[Touhou]]: [[Kawashiro Mitori]]

h4. External links

* "Pixiv Encyclopedia: Akane Miura":https://dic.pixiv.net/en/a/Akane%20Miura
* "Miura Akane Wiki (Jp)":http://www31.atwiki.jp/debichan/
* "Youtube: Fake character song No.2":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m5gdTysaEKo

title: k-on!
body:
A 2007-2012 (after a brief 2010 hiatus) [[4koma]] series written and illustrated by [[Kakifly]], with a 2009-2010 two-season anime adaptation by [[Kyoto Animation]]. A movie was released in 2011.

In order to save their high school's light music club from abolition due to virtually all of its older members graduating, four first-year girls - [[Hirasawa Yui]], [[Tainaka Ritsu]], [[Akiyama Mio]] and [[Kotobuki Tsumugi]] - join the club under the band name "[[Ho-kago Tea Time]]".

There are two sequel series named [[K-On! College]] and [[K-On! High School]]. The former shows the newly graduated girls going to college, while the latter shows Azusa and her friends form a new band.

A spin-off manga, [[k-on!_shuffle|K-On! Shuffle]], began publication in 2018.

title: kawashiro_mitori
body:
A [[Original|fan-created]] Phantasm boss for [[Subterranean Animism]] and older sister of [[Kawashiro Nitori]]. 

Mitori is a red [[Kappa]] living in Hell. Her father is a kappa, and her mother is a human. Her birth made her closed-minded. Now she hates both species. She has the power to prohibit everything.

Her design is based on a keyhole, and the motif of her staff is Japanese [[road sign]] of "closed to vehicular traffic".

The title of the BGM for her stage is "The Kappa Way as Said - One-way Accelerator".

The VIPPERs of [[2channel]] created Mitori. But, they wisely didn't use "安価 (anka)" to make her profiles. The people of [[NicoNico]] applauded VIPPERs' effort.

h4. See also

* [[Sashiromiya Sasha]] (a fake touhou character created by a Nico Nico Douga user)
* [[Sasaki Rinbokusan]] (a failed fake touhou character created by the VIPPERs)

title: yokune_ruko
body:
An [[UTAU]]loid. Ruko is the second attempted joke character made by the VIPPERS of [[2channel]], to trick people into thinking she is the third Vocaloid from Crypton. She is a [[futanari|hermaphrodite]] and is able to sing as a male or a female. Officially, she is mostly male, but fans commonly regard her as a female due to her appearance.

She is tall in stature, and has black hair in [[twintails]] with blue highlights. Her eyes have red and blue [[heterochromia]], which reflects fluency in both Japanese and English. Ruko wears only one glove, on her right hand. Her outfit is a sleeveless dress shirt covered by a sleeveless dress coat, complete with detached sleeves and necktie; she wears low-cut pants which exposes a pair of black string underwear.

She is often drowsy, hence her name's phonetic reading of "Yoku neru ko". Her character items are a pillow and a cup of coffee.

h4. See also

* [[Kasane Teto]]
* [[UTAU]]

h4. External links

* "Utau Wiki: Ruko Yokune":https://utau.fandom.com/wiki/Ruko_Yokune

title: 2channel
body:
[b]2channel[/b] (2ちゃんねる, [i]ni channeru[/i]; 2ch for short) - also known as [b]5channel[/b] (5ちゃんねる, [i]go channeru[/i]; 5ch for short) since 2014 split.

A Japanese internet forum, often thought to be the largest in the world in its prime. It has over 600 boards covering a wide range of topics, as their slogan ('[i]From "hacking" to "side dishes for tonight's dinner"[/i]') would suggest. 

2ch/5ch plays a large part in Japanese internet culture and has created a culture and language in and of itself. [[ascii art|ASCII]] and [[shift jis art|Shift-JIS]] art is popular there and many [[meme]]/[[neta]] and characters have been created based on it. In addition, several internet celebrities have been born there, as have many collaborative projects and pranks (ie: [[Densha Otoko]], [[Buront]], [[Kasane Teto]] and the [[Vippaloid]]s). However, not unlike [[4chan]] of the west, 2ch/5ch is infamous for its near anarchic, non-existent moderation, which results into the site being a hotbed for political extremists and illegal activities.

In 2014, after the dispute about the domain ownership, the original 2ch.net domain was seized by a group of American shareholders led by Jim Watkins and renamed to 5ch.net, whereas the original founder of 2ch, [[Nishimura Hiroyuki (2ch)|]] (who went on to purchase 4chan domain and renamed it "4channel") later opened a "successor" site based in Singapore with the registered domain of 2ch.sg. Both sites are still disputing over their claim of being the "legitimate" successor of 2ch.net to this day.

It is important to note that 2ch/5ch is [i]not[/i] an image board - it is a text board. Do not confuse with "2chan", also known as the [[Futaba channel]], or [[2ch.ru]], a Russian imageboard of similar origin.

h4. See also

* [[2channel (/livejupiter/)]]
* [[4chan]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: 2channel":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2channel
* "Homepage (5ch.net)":http://5ch.net/
* "Homepage (2ch.sg)":http://2ch.sg/

title: namine_ritsu
body:
An [[UTAU]]loid and the third fake [[VOCALOID]] character to be created by the VIPPERS of 2ch to trick people into thinking that he is the 4th Vocaloid from Crypton. He has long red hair, blue-green eyes and dresses in a vaguely [[gothic lolita]] style. 

Despite appearing to have breasts, Ritsu is indeed an [[otoko no ko]]. His 'breasts' are actually missiles that were built into his torso explaining his weight. Like previous joke characters [[Kasane Teto]] and [[Yokune Ruko]], Ritsu's official profile contains strange and impossible characteristics. He is listed as only 6 years old, 156cm in height and with a weight of '25.0t'. Ritsu's character item is, apparently, a Chinese cabbage.

h4. External links

* "Official website":http://canon-voice.com

title: azusa_mifuyu
body:
A character in [[Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden]]. She is acquaintances with [[Nanami Yachiyo]].

She has [[aqua eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[grey hair]] with [[swept bangs]] and [[hair horns]].

In her daily life, she wears a [[black rose|black]] [[hair flower|rose in her hair]], a [[black choker|black]] [[choker]] with an [[orange gemstone]] [[pendant choker|pendant]], a [[necklace]], a [[red shirt|red]]/[[brown shirt|brown]] [[off-shoulder shirt|off-shoulder]] [[shirt]] with [[puffy long sleeves|puffy]] [[long sleeves]] that exposes the [[bra strap]]s, a [[red belt|red]]/[[brown belt|brown]] [[belt]] that features the [[infinity symbol]] symbol, [[black shorts|black]] [[shorts]], [[black thighhighs|black]] [[thighhighs]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[flats]].
When she was younger, she used to wear the [[Mizuna Girls' Academy school uniform]] paired with [[purple thighhighs]].

As a [[Magical Girl]], she wears [[grey ribbon|grey]] [[hair ribbon|ribbons in her hair]], a [[black choker|black]] [[choker]] with an [[aqua gemstone]], a [[grey jacket|grey]] [[sleeveless jacket|sleeveless]] [[jacket]] with a [[hooded jacket|ho]][[hood down|od]], [[fur-trimmed jacket|fur trim]], [[coattails]] and [[pom pom (clothes)|]]s, a [[short dress|short]] [[grey dress|grey]] [[dress]] with [[frilled dress|frills]] and [[cross-laced clothes|cross-lacing]], [[black gloves|black]] [[gloves]], [[long sleeves|long]] [[grey sleeves|grey]] [[fur-trimmed sleeves|fur-trimmed]] [[detached sleeves]], [[grey thighhighs|grey]] [[thighhighs]] and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[fur-trimmed footwear|fur-trimmed]] [[boots]]. She fights using a [[chakram]].

She is voiced by [[Nakahara Mai]].

title: yakumo_mitama
body:
A character in [[Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden]]. A [[Magical Girl]] who operates as a Coordinator in the outskirts of Kamihama. Her younger [[sisters|sister]] is [[Yakumo Mikage]].

Her [[very long hair|very long]] [[grey hair]] is tied into a [[single hair bun|bun]], [[ponytail]] and [[side braid]]. She also has [[sidelocks]], [[hair intakes]] and [[swept bangs]]. 

In her daily life, she typically wears a [[blue shirt|blue]] [[ribbed shirt|ribbed]] [[turtleneck]] with [[short sleeves]] and [[shoulder cutout]]s, a [[necklace]], and [[black pants|black]] [[pants]] with [[buttons]], along with a [[ring]], but she may occasionally wear the [[Daitou Academy school uniform|Daitou Academy uniform]] paired with [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]], instead.

As a [[Magical Girl]], she wears a [[blue rose|blue]] [[hair flower|rose]] and [[black bow]] [[hair bow|in her hair]], a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt|collared]] [[shirt]] with [[short sleeves|short]] [[frilled sleeves]] and [[buttons]], a [[grey ascot|grey]] [[ascot]], [[white gloves|white]] [[gloves]], a [[blue vest|blue]] [[vest]] with [[lapels]] and [[coattails]], a [[miniskirt|short]] [[blue skirt|blue]] [[pencil skirt]] with [[frilled skirt|frills]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[shoes]]. 

She is voiced by [[Horie Yui]].

title: tamaki_iroha
body:
The main character of [[Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden]]. A magical girl whose main goal is to find her missing sister [[Tamaki Ui]] after remembering her from touching a [[small Kyubey]]. [[Nanami Yachiyo]] assists her in finding the truth and solving the mystery.

Her [[very long hair|very long]] [[pink hair]] is tied into a pair of [[side braids]] and a [[low ponytail]]. She also has [[blunt bangs]], [[sidelocks]] and [[pink eyes]].

Early-on in the story, she typically wears the [[Takarazaki school uniform]] paired with [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]], but as the story progresses, she switches to the [[Kamihama University Affiliated School uniform]] paired with [[black thighhighs|black]] [[thighhighs]] with a [[single stripe]]. In both cases, she also wears a [[ring]].

As a [[Magical Girl]] she wears a [[white cloak|white]] [[hooded cloak|hooded]] [[cloak]], [[black gloves|black]] [[gloves]], a [[black shirt|black]] [[turtleneck]] [[crop top]] with [[short sleeves]], a [[bodystocking]], a [[pink belt|belt]], a [[pink skirt|pink]] [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[miniskirt]], [[black shorts|black]] [[shorts under skirt]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[cross-laced footwear|cross-]][[lace-up boots|laced]] [[thigh boots]]. She fights using a [[crossbow]].

Fans of the character use the term "Eroha" to refer to erotic fanarts of her.

She is voiced by [[Asakura Momo]].

She has [[small breasts]], [[blue eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[blue hair]] with [[sidelocks]]

body:
Incredibox is a beatboxing-based music video game created, developed, and published by the French company So Far So Good (SFSG). The concept of the game is users dragging and dropping sound icons on different characters to make music.

Incredibox was released online on August 16, 2009, as a Flash game for web browsers.

title: battle_of_mogadishu
body:
The [[historical event]] the movie [[Black Hawk Down]] is based on. Functionally, this Danbooru tag is the generic tag for the battle itself and anything directly related to the United Nations intervention in Somalia during the early 1990s, and should be used regardless of whether the art is referring to the movie, the game, the historical event, or anything in-between.

The Battle of Mogadishu was a part of the larger United Nations-led effort to end the famine and civil war in Somalia during the early 1990s. On 3 October 1993, a [[UH-60 Blackhawk]] [[helicopter]] operating in support of US forces raiding Somali militias was struck by a [[rpg (weapon)|RPG]] and crashed in the middle of the hostile city of Mogadishu. The next 24 hours saw the fiercest fighting America had experienced since the [[Vietnam War]], costing the lives of eighteen Americans from the task force, and one Malaysian and one Pakistani from the UN rescue force, with over 90 combined US and UN wounded. Estimates for Somali deaths range from 133 to over 700. One American pilot from the second downed [[helicopter]] was captured by Somali forces. The battle dealt the effective end of UN efforts to end Somalia's civil war, and would have a drastic effect on American foreign policy for the rest of the 1990s.

The story of the battle was told in a 1999 book by journalist Mark Bowden, titled [i]Black Hawk Down: A Story of Modern War[/i], which was then adapted into a movie by the same name in 2001 by director Ridley Scott. In addition, the 2003 video game [[delta force (video game)|Delta Force: Black Hawk Down]] depicts a fictionalized version of the Somali civil war, as is the same series' reboot campaign releasing in 2025.

h4. See also
* [[Black Hawk Down]]
* [[Delta Force (video game)]]
* [[tag group:history]]

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia of the Battle":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Mogadishu_(1993)]
* Operations Room: The Battle of Mogadishu 1993 "Part 1":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ApfDyeP7Zk] "Part 2":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nH2rnvGWDuU]

title: power_symbol
body:
One of two symbols composed of a Zero (Circle) and One (vertical line) overlaid on top of each other.

Under the International Electrotechnical Commission (IEC) 60417 standard, Graphical symbols for use on equipment, 0 is the symbol for "off" and 1 is the symbol for "on." Combining these two symbols you get either the symbol for "on/off" (a circle with a vertical line inside of it) or "stand-by" (an incomplete circle with an opening at the top and a vertical line sticking out of the opening).  For electronics it is very common to see the "Standby" symbol used nowadays, as the electronic device does not completely turn off but instead goes into a low power state.

The symbol in [[Purple Heart (neptunia)|]]'s eyes in images like post #1151905 is an example of the "stand-by" symbol.

h4. See also

* "IEC 60417 - 5009 Stand-by":[https://www.iso.org/obp/ui#iec:grs:60417:5009]
* "IEC 60417 - 5010 On/Off":[https://www.iso.org/obp/ui#iec:grs:60417:5010]

title: matou_sakura
body:
[[Fate (series)|]] series character and one of the main characters in [[Fate/Stay Night]].

She has [[purple eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[purple hair]], and a [[red ribbon|red]] [[hair ribbon]]. At school she wears the standard [[Homurabara Academy School Uniform]], while her casual clothes are a [[pink shirt]] and a [[yellow skirt|yellow]] [[long skirt]].

In [[Fate/Zero]], Sakura is [[Tohsaka Rin]]'s sister and the younger daughter of [[Tohsaka Tokiomi|Tokiomi]] and [[Tohsaka Aoi|Aoi]]. She was given away to the Matou family because the laws of the mage world prevented Tokiomi from training more than one of his daughters to carry on his family's tradition, and Tokiomi didn't want Sakura's potential to go to waste. However, [[Matou Zouken|Zouken]] is not really training her as a mage but instead putting her through hell. [[Matou Kariya]] made a deal with Zouken to win the Holy Grail in exchange for Sakura's freedom to return to the Tohsaka family, which he fails to do at the end of the series.

In [[Fate/Stay Night]], Sakura is [[Emiya Shirou|Shirou]]'s timid underclassman and [[Matou Shinji|Shinji]]'s adopted sister. She has been friends with Shirou since the previous summer when he was injured in an accident and she began visiting him with the excuse of taking care of him while he couldn't care for himself. Despite coming from the Matou family, Shinji claims she has been kept in the dark regarding magic as in a traditional magus household only the successor will be taught any magecraft (even though it's later revealed it's a lie and she's [[Medusa (rider) (fate)|Medusa Rider]]'s true master). Though she is respectful of her brother and defends his misconduct, he is in turn an abusive jerk towards her. Further, despite her upbeat attitude with Shirou, she is actually nearly silent and much gloomier when away from the Emiya household or Taiga and has no real friends apart from those two.

In [[Heaven's Feel]], Sakura becomes the love interest of the story and secrets about her life and the Matou family are slowly revealed.

The 6th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Akai Haato]].

It consists of a [[tiara]], both a [[white choker]] and a [[frilled shirt collar|frilled]] [[detached collar]], a [[skirt set]] consisting of a [[white shirt|white]] [[frilled shirt]] with [[puffy short sleeves]] and [[empire waist]], a [[white skirt|white]] [[medium skirt]] and a white [[frilled skirt|frilled]] [[overskirt]], [[white socks]] and [[red footwear|red shoes]].

She has [[official alternate hair length|shorter]] hair with this outfit, with her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] being [[medium hair]] in [[twintails]] with [[sidelocks]] and an [[ahoge]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #5413939: Merchandise
* !post #5240121: L2D

title: elizabeth_bathory_(fate)
body:
Lancer-class servant from the [[Fate (series)|Fate]] series. The (younger) depiction of the Hungarian "blood countess" of the same name.

Appears as a small girl with [[long_hair|long]] [[pink hair]] and [[blue eyes]]. She has [[uneven horns]], a [[dragon_tail|tail]], [[pointy ears]], and pink nails that take up the entirety of her actual fingers. She wears a dress and high heel boots with a single spike protruding from each one which all have a diamond theme.

In [[rojiura satsuki: chapter heroine sanctuary|Rojiura Sanctuary]], she wears an [[idol]] costume with a black [[corset]] and a [[plaid skirt|plaid white-and-black skirt]] (treated as her Second Ascension outfit in [[Fate/Grand Order]]).

[b]True Name:[/b] Elizabeth Báthory
[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Wada Arco]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Ookubo Rumi]]

title: hobo_shuukan_santa_alter-san
body:
[b]Almost Weekly Santa Alter[/b]
[quote]It's December, and Christmas is in the air.
But something strange is going on in Chaldea...
A beautiful lady wearing a mini skirt awaits at the end of Rayshift?
Looks like this Holy Night won't be a silent night for all Masters around the world.
Prepare for a crazy journey with the mysterious Santa and her sack full of dreams!

title: e_pluribus_unum_(fate/grand_order)
body:
[b]Fifth Singularity: North American Myth War, E Pluribus Unum[/b]
[quote]
The fifth Grand Order moves to the year 1783.
Aspiring to become "from many, one," North America is embroiled in a war for independence.
This is an age when gods and legends still roamed the land.
The battle for the fifth Holy Grail has begun!
[/quote]

The fifth singularity in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. It's set in the year 1783 in the [[United States]] shortly after the American revolution, where [[Medb (fate)|]] utilizes her [[holy grail (fate)|]] to summon an [[alter servant|altered]] [[Cu Chulainn Alter (fate)|version]] of [[Cu Chulainn (fate)|]] to rule alongside her as king. The Celtics are opposed by the President-King [[Thomas Edison (fate)|]], with the Celts controlling the eastern half of the North American continent and the Americans controlling the western half. A resistance to both factions was later formed, being opposed to the actions of both parties.

Released on the Japanese server on March 30, 2016 and on the NA server on March 15, 2018.

title: matou_shinji_(fate/extra)
body:
A character from [[Fate/EXTRA]]. He has the same name and appearance as [[Matou Shinji]], but is completely unrelated to him.

In [[Fate/EXTRA]], his servant is [[Francis Drake (Fate)|]]. In [[Fate/Extra CCC]], his servant is [[Elizabeth Bathory (fate/extra)|]]. In [[Fate/EXTRA CCC Fox Tail]], his servant is [[Violet (Fate)|]].

title: se.ra.ph_(fate/grand_order)
body:
[b]Abyssal Cyber Paradise, SE.RA.PH[/b]
[quote]
"A resort event? You thought this would be a walk on the beach?
Welcome, all you foolish Masters!
The fate of the world rests in your silly, useless hands♥"

Our stage will be the Offshore Oil Rig, Seraphix, now a hellish recreation of the Moon Grail War.
This is a cage of ecstasy from which only one can escape.
Only moments remain until the base disintegrates.
And what is it that lurks at the bottom of this dance of Egos...?
[/quote]
[expand=Original Description]
[quote]
"Spring break means it's time for a trip!
It's a little early, but how about a beach event, foolish humans?"
The sudden arrival of the demonic digital brain BB throws Chaldea into a chaotic spring vacation.
A sweet, heated catfight ensues.
Fragile, pure, and sexy...
Look forward to an unforgettable resort event!
[/quote]
[/expand]

The extra pseudo-singularity in [[Fate/Grand Order]], set in the [[Chaldea Security Organization]]'s Seraphix oil rig, which has been displaced into the Mariana Trench in 2030 and transformed into a space resembling the Moon Cell from [[Fate/EXTRA CCC]]. It was initially presented as a collaboration event between Fate/Grand Order and Fate/EXTRA CCC, only to be revealed as a pseudo-singularity upon the event releasing.

Released on the Japanese server on May 1, 2017 and on the NA server on April 23, 2019. It was adapted into a manga by [[Nishiide Kengorou]].

title: kara_no_kyoukai/the_garden_of_order
body:
[b]Spiral Boundary, Ogawa-heim[br][b]the Garden of sinners/the Garden of Order[/b]
[quote]A ripple has appeared on the island nation where Singularity F was observed.
It draws Servants in, inescapable, inexorable.
At the end of the Rayshift stands the girl with Mystic Eyes of Death Perception.
But even with her help, uncovering the truth will not be easy...
[/quote]
A collaboration event in [[Fate/Grand Order]] with [[Kara no Kyoukai]], released on the Japanese server on February 25, 2016 and on the NA server on February 8, 2018.

title: shi_jin_(fate)
body:
Accompanies [[Kumonryuu Eliza (fate)|]] as her draconic three-sectioned staff. He was a Servant summoned with [[Elizabeth Bathory (fate/extra)|Lancer Elizabeth Bathory]], but they were defeated in battle. Shi Jin decided to impart his Spirit Origin to Elizabeth, fusing them together into the Nine-Tattoo Dragon Eliza.

Shi Jin is one of the 108 Stars of Destiny from [i]Water Margin[/i], specifically the Minute Star (#23 of the 36 Heavenly Stars), known as "Nine-Tattoo Dragon" for the many dragon tattoos on his body. Elizabeth Bathory herself is affiliated with dragons due to her family using the fang of a dragon as its family crest, so those aspects are fused together into their Pretender version.

title: nero_matsuri
body:
[b]Nero Fest ~The Colosseum of Victory~[/b]
[quote]
[b]The time is now!!!![/b]
Rejoice, my beloved Roman citizen!
Be prosper and enjoy, the ample and extravagant Rome!
I hereby announce the start of the new Olympia, the start of Nero Fest!
In the Colosseum built especially for this day, display your might, grasp glory and reward with your own hands!
[/quote]
The first limited-time event in [[Fate/Grand Order]], first held on the Japanese server starting on September 16, 2015 and on the NA server on July 25, 2017. It would have reruns with new Craft Essences and added story scenes three times, in 2016, 2017, and 2021.

title: orleans_(fate/grand_order)
body:
[b]First Singularity: Hundred Years' War of the Evil Dragons, Orleans[/b]
[quote]
The first Grand Order is set in 1431 A.D. during the Hundred Years' War, a turbulent period for medieval France.
As the world faces the threat of abominable monsters, the fight to protect humanity begins.
[/quote]
The first proper singularity in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. It's set in the year 1431 in [[France]], shortly after [[Jeanne d'Arc (ruler) (fate)|Jeanne d'Arc]] was burned at the stake, resulting in [[Gilles de Rais (caster) (fate)|Gilles de Rais]] attempting to utilize a [[holy grail (fate)|]] to revive her, instead creating an [[Jeanne d'Arc Alter (avenger) (fate)|altered manifestation]] of her. The two then begin a revenge campaign against all of France along with several servants summoned in a semi-Berserk state.

h4. Characters

title: septem_(fate/grand_order)
body:
[b]Second Singularity: Eternal Madness Empire, Septem[/b]
[quote]
The second Grand Order is set in the Roman Empire of 60 A.D.
This ancient nation, founded upon the Septem Montes, is ruled by its third emperor,
Nero, who now faces her legendary predecessors, each revived as a Servant.
[/quote]
The second singularity in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. It's set in the year 60 in the [[Roman Empire]], during the early years of [[Nero Claudius (fate/extra)|]]'s reign. [[Lev Lainur Flauros]] arrived intending to hand his [[holy grail (fate)|]] to someone who wished to destroy the era, but unable to find someone he instead summoned various servants who formed the United Roman Empire and began conquering the Roman Empire's territories.

title: halloween_comeback!
body:
[b]Ultra Demon Castle Csejte[br]Halloween Comeback! Super☆Ghouls 'n Pumpkins ~The Seeds of Adventure...~[/b]
[quote]Trick or Torture! I've missed you all, my pumpkins!

Once again, I will hold a special concert for all you pumpkins having a lonely Halloween...
Or I'd like to, but I'm in a bit of a pickle!

That's right! My beautiful Castle Csejte has been taken over by some weird witch! DIE!
Not only that, but she says Halloween is forbidden!
The whole castle is in a panic! My special concert is ruined!
You'll come to my aid in this time of peril, won't you, my pumpkins?![/quote]
A limited time [[Halloween]] event in [[Fate/Grand Order]], released on the Japanese server on October 19, 2016 and on the NA server on October 25, 2018.

title: akai_haato_(gothic_lolita)
body:
The 5th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Akai Haato]]. This is the costume that is best associated with her [i]Haachama[/i] persona.

It is a [[gothic lolita]] costume (designed by [[tsukana (saba mizore)|Saba Mizore]]) consisting of a [[short dress|short]] [[red dress|red]] [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[layered dress]] with a [[black belt]], [[black thighhighs]] a [[single legwear garter|single]] [[legwear garter]] and [[black footwear|black]] [[lace-up boots]], she often wears a [[black capelet|black]] [[frilled capelet]] with a [[red bowtie]] and a [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]], [[double-breasted]] [[black coat]] with a [[black skirt]] [[overskirt]] (although it's sometimes depicted as just a [[black dress]] and a [[red skirt]].

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] with this costume is [[very long hair]] in a [[two side up]] decorated with a small [[hair bow]] with a [[black rose]], multiple [[hairclip]]s and several [[heart hair ornament]]s.

h4. Appearance

* !post #7980255: Merchandise
* !post #4169223: L2D

body:

It's a [[carhop]] [[waitress]] uniform consisting of a [[red choker]], either a [[red shirt|red]] [[cropped shirt|cropped]] [[double-breasted]] [[polka dot shirt]] or a [[layered bikini|layered]] [[bikini top only|bikini top]] with a [[name tag]], a [[red skirt|red]] [[polka dot skirt|polka dot]] [[miniskirt]] with a [[white apron|white]] [[waist apron]], [[black garter straps]] connected to [[white thighhighs]] and [[black footwear|black]] [[mary janes]]. She also has an optional [[hamburger hat]]

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] in this costume, it consists of a pair of [[twintails|twin]] [[twin braids|braids]] tied with [[cherry hair ornament|cherry-shaped]] [[hair bobbles]] and decorated with a [[fork hair ornament|fork]] and [[knife hair ornament|knife]] [[hairclip]] on one side of her head and a ketchup bottle-shaped on the other.

title: gm_sniper_iii
body:
A fictional manned giant robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse.

[b]RGM-79SR GM Sniper III[/b]

A [[titans_(gundam)|Titans]] long range support [[mobile_suit|MS]] derived from the  [[Earth Federation]] [[GM Kai]] but equipped with a long-range [[beam rifle]] and an [[assault visor]] which contains high-performance optical targeting equipment. The GM Sniper III's sensors, thrusters, and other systems were upgraded to match the specifications of the EF [[GM II]].

body:
[[Elizabeth Bathory (fate)|]] in her Third Ascension outfit from [[Fate/Grand Order]]. It is a garish idol costume with a [[vertical-striped headwear|vertical-striped hat]] that has plush animals on top, a [[blue bow]], and flowers lining the puffed-out dress. She wears this throughout the American Singularity storyline in FGO. An [[adapted costume|adapted]] version also shows up in the [[elizabeth bathory (joint recital) (fate)|Joint Recital]] [[Craft Essence (fate)|]].

This is the outfit Elizabeth wears in the [b]A Spear of an Aria, A Spear of a Clamor[/b] [[Craft Essence (fate)|]].

body:
[[Elizabeth Bathory (fate)|]] in her Second Ascension outfit from [[Fate/Grand Order]]. This was the outfit she wore in [[Rojiura Satsuki: Chapter Heroine Sanctuary]], which has a grey plaid skirt beneath a black corset, and a white halterneck. Here, she is the fifth Golden Heroine called [b]CCC 48 Red Lancer[/b], and represents the Dragon in the Chinese zodiac. In [[Fate/Grand Order]], she wears this outfit during the Orleans and Septem Singularity storylines.

h4. Appearance

* !post #2531166

title: assassin_(fate/zero)
body:
The Servant of [[Kotomine Kirei]] in the 4th Holy Grail War. His unique trait is the capability to manifest as multiple entities at once.

The multiple bodies of Assassin can vary widely in [[child assassin (fate/zero)|age]], [[female assassin (fate/zero)|gender]], build, and style of dress, but in general, their hair appears purple, and their skin and clothing are nearly black. They wear the standard skull mask associated with the known Hassan of the other Grail Wars. Their unique sobriquet among the Hassan is "of the Hundred Faces".

Not to be mistaken with [[Sasaki Kojirou (fate)|]].

[b]True Name:[/b] Hassan-i-Sabbah

h4. See also

* [[Kotomine Kirei]]

h4. External links

* "Type-Moon Wiki: Hassan of the Hundred Faces":[https://typemoon.fandom.com/wiki/Hassan_of_the_Hundred_Faces]

title: ironmouse_outfit_art_contest
body:
The [i]Ironmouse Outfit Art Contest[/i] ran from January 13 to February 10, 2023, otherwise referred to by its hashtag name of the DressUpSayton Contest.

The contest was held so that viewers could make costume concepts for [[Ironmouse]], with the chosen winners being turned into proper models. Initially "slated":[https://twitter.com/ironmouse/status/1614034250092748807] to feature only five winners, a whopping 37 designs were chosen as winners upon the "reveal of the results":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eyVhKZG1cT0] on March 12th. Each winner won $1,000 each.

Use this tag for the designs created as part of the contest, whether it be art of the winners or otherwise.

h4. Winners

Winners will be listed in order of model creation (and if they haven't gotten a model yet, they'll be listed in the order they appeared in the results stream).

* !post #6377480: Bloom Angel
* !asset #22858418: Winter Doll
* !asset #22858421: Sweet Nightmares
* !post #7815438: Decora
* !asset #22858451: Infernal Cult Princess
* !asset #24589345: Moonlight Demon
* !asset #24589342: Cyber Mouse

h4. External links

* Ironmouse Model Index: "Contest winners":[https://www.ironmousemodelindex.com/contest-winners]

title: nero_claudius_(fate)
body:
A Saber-class servant in the [[Fate (series)|]] series. She first appeared in [[Fate/Extra]] and [[Fate/Extra CCC]], then later in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. This is an umbrella tag for all versions of Nero Claudius under one tag.

She looks very similar to [[Artoria Pendragon (Fate)|]], with [[blonde hair]] tied up in a [[single hair bun]] with a [[braided bun|braid]], an [[ahoge]], and [[green eyes]] (although of a different hue), but she normally wears a military-style [[red dress]], and has noticeably [[large breasts|larger breasts]]. Her personality is more outgoing and haughty, albeit engendered by a sense of noblesse oblige. Her catchphrase is "[[umu (phrase)|umu]]!"

Despite their very similar appearances, Nero Claudius and [[Artoria Pendragon (fate)|]] are considered to be separate characters.

Her voice actress is [[Tange Sakura]].

h4. Variations

* [[Nero Claudius (Fate/Extra)]] (Saber Extra)
* [[Nero Claudius (Swimsuit Caster) (fate)|]]
* [[Nero Claudius (Bride) (fate)|]] (Saber Bride)
* [[Queen Draco (fate)|]]

h4. See also

* [[Artoria Pendragon (Fate)|]] (Saber)
* [[Mordred (Fate)|]] (Saber of Red)
* [[Aestus Estus]]
* [[Aestus Domus Aurea]]
* [[Padoru (meme)]]
* [[List of Fate series characters]]

h4. External links

* "Type-Moon Wiki: Nero Claudius":[https://typemoon.fandom.com/wiki/Nero_Claudius]
other_names: ネロ・クラウディウス(Fate)
ネロ・クラウディウス

title: jekyll_and_hyde_(fate)
body:
An Assassin-class servant in [[Fate/Grand Order]].

[[Henry Jekyll (Fate)|]] is the neat-looking one, while [[Hyde (Fate)|]] has [[red eyes]], [[messy hair]], an unbuttoned vest and a [[blood stain]] on his shirt. They both use a knife in combat.

In [[Fate/Grand Order]], Jekyll starts as an Assassin, and when he changes to Hyde via his Noble Phantasm, he becomes a Berserker.

[b]True Name:[/b] Dr. Henry Jekyll & Mr. Edward Hyde
[b]Character Designer:[/b] [[Nakahara (Mu Tation)]]
[b]Voice Actor:[/b] [[Miyano Mamoru]]

h4. Appearance

* !post #7567166: Front: [[Hyde (Fate)|]][br]Back: [[Henry Jekyll (Fate)|]]
* !asset #24589287: [[hyde (noisy obsession) (fate)|Noisy Obsession]] (Front)
* !post #3649894: [[henry jekyll (you after the rain) (fate)|You After the Rain]] (Left)

h4. External links

* "Type-Moon Wiki: Henry Jekyll and Hyde":https://typemoon.fandom.com/wiki/Henry_Jekyll_and_Hyde_(Assassin)

title: hyde_(fate)
body:
The secondary personality of [[Jekyll and Hyde (fate)|]] that manifests after [[Henry Jekyll (fate)|]] uses his [[Noble Phantasm (fate)|]] [b]Dangerous Game[/b].

In [[Fate/Prototype: Fragments of Blue and Silver]], the transformation results in him appearing as a [[werewolf]]-like creature. After being corrupted by the [[Holy Grail (fate)|]], he becomes the dominant personality and can temporarily maintain a human form for only an hour at a time.

In [[Fate/Grand Order]], the transformation keeps in a human form, but he switches his class from Assassin to Berserker.

h4. Appearance

* !post #7567166: Front: [[Hyde (Fate)|]][br]Back: [[Henry Jekyll (Fate)|]]

title: eltnum_(under_night_in-birth)
body:
Character from [[Under Night In-Birth]]. She is almost completely identical to (and may actually be) [[Sion Eltnam Atlasia]] from [[Melty Blood]], the previous fighting game from the same developers, [[French-Bread]]. She's constantly breaking the [[fourth wall]], refers to other characters as "rookies" and prefers to be called "Miss Eltnum" as she sees herself as a sort of "mentor" to them. She also looks up to [[Akatsuki (Akatsuki Blitzkampf)|Akatsuki]] and calls him "senpai".

Voiced by [[Akesaka Satomi]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #1756130
* !asset #14718075

body:
Main heroine of [[Melty Blood]].

Born Sion Eltnam Sokaris.

If she loses herself, she will turn into a [[vampire]] ([[Sion Tatari]]). There is also a possibility she will turn into the [[Dust of Osiris]] in the far future. Sion also makes a guest appearance in [[Under Night In-Birth]] (named [[Eltnum (under night in-birth)|]]). 

An alternate version of her (still going by [[Sion Eltnam Sokaris|Sokaris]]) exists in [[Fate/Grand Order]].

title: tiamat_(fate)
body:
A major antagonist in [[Fate/Grand Order]], appearing only in the Babylonia Singularity of the game and the accompanying anime. The Primordial Mother who created the world, but was betrayed by her children. She went mad out of grief and attempted to replace humanity with a new species called the [[Lahmu (fate)|]].

Introduced as a playable Servant in [[Fate/Grand Order Arcade]], under the Alter Ego class, as [[Larva Tiamat (fate)|]].

title: arcueid_brunestud
body: Arcueid Brunestud (アルクェイド・ブリュ ンスタッド, Arukueido Buryunsutaddo) is a character in the popular Japanese visual novel and anime series [[Tsukihime]], who also makes an appearance in the fighting game [[Melty Blood]] by [[Type-Moon]]. She is voiced by Hitomi Nabatame in the Tsukihime anime, by Ryouka Yuzuki in Melty Blood, and Ikumi Hasegawa in Type Lumina, the remake, and as [[Archetype_EARTH|Archetype: EARTH]] in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. She has [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] styled in [[hair intakes]], [[medium breasts|medium]] to [[large breasts]], as well as [[red eyes]]. Her clothing consists of a white [[turtleneck sweater]], a [[long skirt|long]] [[purple skirt]] and [[black pantyhose]]. In the remake, she wears a [[blue skirt|blue]] [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[miniskirt]] instead along with a silver [[necklace]]. h4. Appearance * !post #803694: [[Tsukihime]] * !post #2087308: [[Tsukihime (Remake)]] * !post #65863: [[Fate/tiger colosseum]] h6. title: rengoku_(fate)
body:
The name of [[Okita Souji Alter (fate)|]]'s long katana.

Rengoku becomes personified as an [[androgynous]] person of "ambiguous gender":https://www.reddit.com/r/grandorder/comments/pl0ogq/profiles_of_the_four_new_summer_servants/ alongside [[okita souji alter (swimsuit saber) (fate)|Okita Souji Alter Swimsuit Saber]]. They have the form of a child for Okita's 1st and 2nd Ascensions and return to being a sword in her 3rd ascension.

This tag is for the human personification of the sword. For the sword itself, see [[Rengoku (sword) (fate)|]].

title: okita_souji_alter_(fate)
body:
A character from [[Koha-Ace]], an alter version of [[Okita Souji (fate)|]]. Originally known as "Majin Saber" during the manga's [i]XP[/i] run, she was a Saber-class gag character lampooning the concept of powerful fusions and [[dark persona]] (Alter forms in Fate universe). In [[Fate/Grand Order]], she appears as an Alter Ego-class Servant.

She appears as a young woman with [[long_hair|long]] [[white hair]], [[tied_hair|tied]] back at either side with red [[tassel|tassels]]. She wears a red and black dress bearing similarity to a short kimono and long European style coat, complete with [[high collar]] held closed by a rope tassel.

Her swimsuit variant is [[Okita Souji Alter (Swimsuit Saber) (fate)|]].

h4. Appearance

* !asset #24588787: [[Okita Souji Alter (First Ascension) (fate)|First Ascension]]

title: jerid_messa
body:
A fictional antagonist character from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse. He appears in [[Zeta Gundam]]. 

[b]Jerid Messa[/b] is an arrogant, brash member of the [[titans_(gundam)|Titans]] who unintentionally sparks a planetary conflict by insulting a [[kamille bidan|random guy]]. 

His mecha of choice are the [[Gundam Mk II]], the [[Hizack]], the [[Galbaldy Beta]] the [[Marasai]], the [[Gabthley]]. the [[Byalant]] and the [[Baund Doc]]. [spoilers]Dies at the end of The Gryps War in battle against Kamille Bidan's [[zeta_gundam_(mobile_Suit)|Zeta Gundam]] who threw his Baund Doc towards the wreckage of the recently destroyed [i][[henken_bekkener|Radish]][/i] [[AEUG]] [[military]] [[spacecraft]].[/spoilers]

h4.Jerid's Women
* [[Lila Milla Rira]]
* [[Mouar Pharaoh]]

body:

Wears the outfit from her [[Okita Souji Alter (First Ascension) (Fate)|first ascension]] with the hairstyle from her [[Okita Souji Alter (Third Ascension) (fate)|third ascension]], has [[black eyes]], and a [[flat chest]].

title: rengoku_(sword)_(fate)
body:
[[Okita Souji Alter (Fate)|]]'s signature [[sword]]. It has a unique hilt and a red accent on its blade, and is stored in a gold-accented sheath.

During the [[Chaldea Summer Adventure]] event, its personality gains a [[Rengoku (fate)|humanoid form]], and both itself and [[Okita Souji Alter (Swimsuit Saber) (fate)|]] utilize modified versions of Rengoku's sword form. During the [[GUDAGUDA Shin Yamatai-koku]] event, he possesses her body as the dominant personality under the name [[Rengoku Alter (fate)|]], resulting in her gaining a [[flat chest]].

Not to be confused with other ordinary [[katana]]s that she wields.

h4. Appearance

* !asset #24588748
* !post #3158574: [[Okita Souji Alter (Fate)|]] wielding Rengoku
* !post #5590964: [[Okita Souji Alter (Fate)|]] wielding an ordinary katana in her right hand with Rengoku sheathed at her waist

title: aura_(sousou_no_frieren)
body:
[[Sousou no Frieren]] character.

Aura is one of the Seven Sages of Destruction directly serving the Demon King. Using her signature magic, Azerilyse (Subjugation magic), she weighs the mana of her opponent's soul as well as hers own on her [[balance scale|magic scales]], which grants the soul with more mana complete control over the loser's body.

[spoiler]She is overpowered by Frieren and ordered to kill herself, [[aura bullying (meme)|which she does by decapitation using her own sword to cut her neck off]].[/spoiler]

h4. Example
* !post #7397468

h4. See also

* [[Aura bullying (meme)]]
other_names: アウラ(葬送のフリーレン)

title: osomatsu-san

title: m14
body:
The [b]M14[/b] is an [[united_states|American]]-designed 7.62×51mm NATO [b][[battle rifle]][/b], developed in 1954 by Earle Harvey and Lloyd Corbett at Springfield Armory, adopted by the U.S. military in 1959. Its design was heavily based on the earlier [[M1 Garand]], but with the 20-round detachable magazines and ability to fire in full-automatic akin to the [[M1918 BAR]] instead of an 8-round internal magazine like the Garand.

Beginning in 1963, however, the M14 began to be supplanted by the [[M16]] [[rifle]], which fully replaced the M14 as the U.S military's main firearm by 1969. The M14 continues to be used in some secondary (marksman) and specialist roles due to its firepower, longer range, power and accuracy.

h4. See also
* [[M14 (Girls' Frontline)]]

title: twin_peaks
body: Twin Peaks is an American surrealist mystery-horror drama television series created by Mark Frost and [[David Lynch]]. It premiered on ABC on April 8, 1990, and ran for two seasons until its cancellation in 1991. A prequel movie, Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me, was released on May 16, 1992. The show returned in 2017 for a third season on Showtime.

title: dorothy_(nikke)
body:
A character from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]].

The leader of [[Inherit (nikke)|]], Dorothy serves as a guide for newcomers within Eden, a remote place situated on the surface where humans and Nikkes coexist. Her courteous facade hides an insidious and cruel personality.

In the earliest days of the Rapture invasion, Dorothy served as a member of the [[Goddess (Nikke)|]] squad, consisting of her, [[Liliweiss (nikke)|]], [[Snow White (Innocent Days) (nikke)|Snow White]], [[Scarlet (Black Shadow) (nikke)|Scarlet]], [[Red Hood (nikke)|]] and [[Rapunzel (nikke)|]]. She took the role of acting leader after Liliweiss's untimely death.

During their battle for survival and the defense of the Ark, Dorothy was forced to euthanize her fellow Nikke and friend, [[Pinne (nikke)|]], when the latter became corrupted. This plunged Dorothy into spiraling depression, leading her to attempt suicide. However, the other members of the Goddess squad managed to stop her and confined her to prevent self-harm. In isolation, Dorothy suffered from hallucinations of Pinne, much to her squadmates' confusion.

Not long after Pinne's death, the Central Government of the Ark betrayed the Goddess squad by sealing them outside. As a result, Dorothy was left to wander around the surface, becoming filled with bitterness and resentment towards the Ark, and had been planning long-term about her revenge before becoming the leader of Inherit.

As she was a former member of Goddess squad like the Pioneer squad members, Dorothy is named after a children's novel character instead of a Biblical figure. In this case, she is named after [[Dorothy Gale]], the protagonist of the "The Wonderful Wizard of Oz":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wonderful_Wizard_of_Oz].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[pink hair]] [[tied hair|tied]] in [[braid]]s and a single [[hair bun]] on the left side, along with [[pink eyes|pink]]/[[purple eyes]] and [[large breasts]]. Her regular outfit consists of a [[see-through dress|see-through]] [[frilled dress|frilled]] [[white dress]] with [[detached sleeves]] which partially shows her [[white panties]], [[white legwear|white]] [[thighhighs]], and [[high heels]]. She can transform into her battle form which consist of [[armored dress]] with [[horns|horn]]-like [[headgear]], [[bracer]], [[mechanical wings]], and [[armored boots]].

Illustrator: [[Yoya Yogurt]]

h4. Skins

* !post #6245768
* !post #6265668: Default
* !post #6265674: Alternate Form
* !post #6847937: [[Dorothy (Nostalgia) (Nikke)|Nostalgia]]

h4.Others
* [[Doro (Nikke)|]]

title: pioneer_(nikke)
body:
A squad from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]].

A Pilgrim squad formed by the remnants of the former [[Goddess_(nikke)|]] squad members: [[Snow White (nikke)|]], [[Rapunzel (nikke)|]], and [[Scarlet (nikke)|]]. [spoiler]Despite being a squad, each member has their own different agenda and goals, while they meet up at a certain rendezvous to ensure each other's survival.[/spoiler]

title: rapunzel_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. 

A member of the Pioneer squad along with [[Scarlet (Nikke)|Scarlet]] and [[Snow White (Nikke)|Snow White]]. A saint-like figure who appeases the spirits of those who have died on the surface. Often found lost in prayer, she is also prone to reminiscence. [spoiler]In spite of her innocent attitude, she is a huge pervert. This salacious mind has been attributed to a long-gone friend "[[red_hood_(nikke)|Red Hood]]" who is fond of adult magazines.[/spoiler]

Like all members of [[Pioneer (Nikke)|]], Rapunzel is named after the tiular character of the "European fairy tale of the same name":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rapunzel].

She has [[blue eyes]] and [[very long hair|very long]] [[blonde hair|yellow hair]] tied to a [[braid]]. She wears a [[nun]]-themed outfit consists of a [[black robe]], and an [[armored bodysuit]]. She also carries a [[staff]]-esque [[rocket launcher]].

title: snow_white_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. 

A member of the Pioneer squad along with [[Scarlet (Nikke)|Scarlet]] and [[Rapunzel (Nikke)|Rapunzel]]. A puritanical pilgrim who wanders the surface in an effort to protect humanity. As a member of Pioneer, her days are spent wiping out Raptures with extreme prejudice. [spoiler] Because of the lack of food on the surface, she forced herself to survive by eating spoiled [[field ration]]s, and has become quite fixated on any food she can find.[/spoiler]

Like all members of Pioneer, Snow White and her weapons are all named after the characters from the "German fairy tale of the same name":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snow_White].

She has [[yellow eyes]] and [[white hair|white]] [[long hair]]. She's a [[mecha musume]] with a [[single mechanical arm]]. She wears a [[visor (armor)]], a [[white cloak]], has [[dog tags]], [[shoulder armor]] and [[armored boots]]. Usually carries a [[assault rifle]] and a [[sniper rifle]]

It's common for artists to mix-and-match elements of this ascension with her final ascension. If elements from both are visible, tag both ascensions.

Not to be confused with her [[Saber Alter (gothic Lolita)|Gothic Lolita]] costume or her [[Artoria Pendragon (Alter Swimsuit Rider) (Third Ascension) (Fate)|Alter Rider Swimsuit's third ascension]].

title: scarlet_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. 

A member of the Pioneer squad along with [[Snow White (Nikke)|Snow White]] and [[Rapunzel (Nikke)|Rapunzel]]. She's a wandering swordswoman who's partial to a good drink. Despite the common perception of melee weapons being ineffective in combat, she chooses to wield a [[sword]]. [spoiler] Although she likes [[alcohol]], she doesn't hold it very well and can easily get [[drunk]]. [/spoiler]

Like all members of Pioneer, Scarlet is named after a figure from folklore: the titular character Hongryeon (which is Scarlet's name in Korean) from the Korean folktale "The Legend of Janghwa and Hongryeon":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Janghwa_Hongryeon_jeon].

She has [[yellow eyes]], [[grey hair|grey]] [[long hair]] and [[medium breasts]]. She carries a [[sword]] which she keeps in her [[sheath]] on her [[weapon on back|back]]. She wears a [[large hat|large]] [[jingasa]], a [[white leotard]], resembling some sort of [[japanese armor]] with [[clothing cutout|cutouts]]. Wears a few pieces of japanese armor though reduced in size [[sode]] for her left arm, [[kote]] on her right arm, and a single sided left thigh protector [[haidate]].

h4. Skins

title: model_employee_parvati
body:
Parvati is the model employee of the unofficial post facto clean up team of Kamazon in [[Guardian Tales]].

The unofficial post facto clean up team takes out those who threaten or get in Kamazon's way. Parvati always maintains top performance within the organization full of various assassins. Kamazon views Parvati favorably as well due to her obedience towards superiors and her capability to swiftly take out any target. Some areas fell into complete pandemonium due to her superior abilities. However Parvati herself is unaware she's the cause behind the chaos.

There's a sole reason Parvati got a job at Kamazon after being trained under her father with her younger sister at a young age. It was her father's dying wish for Parvati to live an ordinary life and get hired by an ordinary company. She believed getting employed at the famous Kamazon meant living an ordinary life, so she kept applying. But the world wasn't her oyster. After being rejected interview after interview, she finally got hired through a recommendation to a department that suited her skillset.

Now that she's finally achieved her father's dying wish, Parvati completely believes she's an ordinary employee like everyone else. And she doesn't doubt it at all. Because her job required her to move from place to place, she gets really annoyed from moving constantly. Her only hobby is seeking out new local delicacies when she moves into a new town. Parvati's life is satisfactory in all aspects, but her one wish is for Tinia, her younger sister, to live an ordinary life just like her.
other_names: パールヴァティー(ガーディアンテイルズ)

title: perky_goth
body:
Western alternative fashion trend originating in the 1980s. It combines the darker elements of [[goth fashion]] with vibrant, upbeat elements and focuses on the contrast between the two.

The fashion often consists of black clothing paired with bright and cheerful colors, [[fishnets]], dyed hair, [[boots]], fun patterns, skirts/dresses, and chokers. Makeup usually involves dramatic eyeshadow and/or eyeliner.

h4. External links

* "Aesthetics Wiki: Perky Goth":https://aesthetics.fandom.com/wiki/Perky_Goth

h4. See also

* [[tag group:fashion style]]

title: m1_carbine
body:
An American semi-automatic [[rifle|carbine]], chambered for the proprietary .30 Carbine [[ammunition|cartridge]]. Despite the name, it is not the shortened variant of the [[M1 Garand]] but instead its own distinct design. Adopted in 1942, the M1 Carbine was a standard [[gun|firearm]] for the US military during World War II, the Korean War and into the Vietnam War. Although the Carbine was the most-produced US small arm of WW2, it is a relatively rare sight in media, particularly in comparison to the far-less-common [[Thompson submachine gun]]. 

Distinguishing features of the Carbine are the two pins on the upper stock just forward of the bolt. World War Two-era Carbines had a clean barrel from the stock to the muzzle and simple flip-tab rear sights, though later versions added a [[bayonet]] lug and more advanced graduated rear sights. The standard feed system is a 15-round box [[magazine (weapon)|magazine]].

* The M1A1 Carbine is the variant that features a metal side-[[folding stock]] and a pistol grip.
* The [[M2 Carbine]] is the name given to Carbines made capable of firing on full-automatic. It is distinguished from the M1 in media through the use of the curved 30-round magazine instead of the 15-round box.
* The M3 Carbine is an M2 with a prototype night-vision scope attached to the top. 

h1. See also
* [[List of Weapons]]
* [[M1A1 (Girls' Frontline)]]
* [[M2 Carbine]]
* [[M50 Reising]]

h1. External links
* "Wikipedia: M1 Carbine":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M1_carbine

title: m2_carbine
body:
Development of the [[M1 Carbine]], capable of both semi and full-automatic fire. Because there is no real functional difference between the M2 Carbine and an upgraded M1, media has settled on discerning the two using their (interchangeable) magazines. A Carbine depicted with the curved, extended 30-[[ammunition|round]] [[magazine (weapon)|magazine]] is designated the M2 Carbine, while a Carbine with the boxy 15-round magazine is the M1 Carbine.

h1. See also
* [[List of weapons]]
* [[M1 Carbine]]
* [[M50 Reising]]

title: skyla_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Skyla[/b], known as [b]Fuuro[/b] (フウロ) in Japan, is a character introduced in [i][[pokemon|Pokémon]] [[pokemon bw|Black and White]][/i].

Normally a cargo plane [[pilot]], this Gym Leader flies through the sky with her [[pokemon (creature)|Pokémon]]. Her cheery personality has earned her many fans. Her signature Pokémon is [[Swanna]].

She has [[blue eyes]], and [[red hair]] with [[short hair with long locks|long]] [[sidelocks|locks]] and tied [[one side up]] with an [[hair ornament|ornament]]. She wears a [[blue jacket|blue]] [[crop top|cropped]] [[cropped jacket|jacket]] [[turtleneck]] [[jacket]] that exposes [[midriff]], [[blue shorts|blue]] [[short shorts]], [[blue gloves]], a [[thigh pouch]], and [[blue footwear|blue]] [[boots]].

Already popular for her attractive design, the [[2024 Pokemon Teraleak]] caused a resurgence in her popularity when leaked documents were found that explicitly called her a "sexy pilot", as well as Hispanic.

title: help:posts
body:
A post represents a single image that's been uploaded. Each post can have many [[help:tags|tags]], [[help:comments|comments]], [[help:notes|notes]], and a single [[help:artist commentary|artist commentary]]. Each post may also belong to multiple [[help:pools|pools]]. If you have an [[help:users|account]], you can also add a post to your [[help:favorites|favorites]] or [[help:favorite groups|favorite groups]].

h4. Searching

Searching for posts is straightforward. Simply enter the tags you want to search for, separating tags by spaces and words [i]within[/i] tags by underscores. For example, searching for {{blonde_hair blue_eyes}} will return every post that has both the [[blonde hair]] tag [b]and[/b] the [[blue eyes]] tag.

Be aware that tags for characters and series are usually known by their original Japanese names, not their English names. For example, the tag on Danbooru for [i]The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya[/i] is [[Suzumiya Haruhi no Yuuutsu]]. See [[help:tags]] for more information.

Danbooru also offers many metatags that let you further refine your search. Metatags allow you to query on things like image width, height, score, uploader, upload date, and more. Consult the [[help:cheatsheet|cheat sheet]] for a complete list of what you can do.

Finally, note that Members are limited to two tags per search. See [[help:users]] for details.

h4. Tag List

In both the post listing page and on individual post pages you'll notice a list of tags with links next to them. Here's an explanation of what the links are:

[b]?[/b]
    This links to the wiki page for the tag. If the tag is an [[help:artists|artist]] type, then you'll be redirected to the artist page.

[b]950[/b]
    The number next to the tag represents how many posts there are. This isn't always the total number of posts for that tag. If you're searching for a combination of tags, this will be the number of posts that have the tag AND the current tag query. If you're not searching for anything, this will be the number of posts found within the last twenty-four hours.

[b]Color[/b]
    Some tag links may be colored green, purple, or red. Green means the tag represents a character. Purple means the tag represents a copyright (things like anime, manga, games, or novels). Red means the tag represents an [[help:artists|artist]].

When you're not searching for a tag, by default the tag list will show the most popular tags within the last three days. When you are searching for tags, the tag list will show related tags, sorted by relevancy.

h2#mode-menu. Mode Menu

[[help:users|Gold and above users]] will notice a menu labeled "Mode" in the sidebar on the main listing page. This menu lets you make several changes without ever leaving the listing page. Simply select an option and whenever you click on a thumbnail, the action will be performed in the background.

[b]View[/b]
    This is the default mode. Whenever you click on a thumbnail, you'll go to that post.

[b]Edit[/b]
    Whenever you click on a thumbnail, an edit box will appear. Here you can easily change the post's tags from the listing page without opening the entire post.

[b]Tag script[/b]
    Write a tag script into the text box that appears, and it will be applied when you click on the thumbnail of a post. This allows you to quickly add or remove tags to many posts at once. See [[help:tag scripts]] for details on creating tag scripts.

[b]Favorite[/b]
    Whenever you click on a thumbnail, that post will be added to your list of [[help:favorites|favorites]].

[b]Unfavorite[/b]
    Whenever you click on a thumbnail, that post will be removed from your list of [[help:favorites|favorites]].

h4. Borders

In the listing page, you will notice that some thumbnails have a border. The meaning of this border depends on the color.

[b]Blue[/b]
    The post is [[about:mod_queue|pending moderator approval]] or was [[about:mod_queue|flagged for deletion]].

[b]Black[/b]
    The post is [[about:mod_queue|deleted]].

[b]Green[/b]
    The post has [[help:post relationships|child posts]].

[b]Yellow[/b]
    The post has a [[help:post relationships|parent]].

title: brussels
body: The City of Brussels is the largest municipality and historical centre of the Brussels-Capital Region, as well as the capital of the French Community of [[Belgium]], the Flemish Region (from which it is separate) and [[Belgium]]. The City of Brussels is also the administrative centre of the [[European Union]], as it hosts a number of principal EU institutions in its European Quarter.

title: antwerp
body: Antwerp is a city and a municipality in the Flemish Region of [[Belgium]]. It is the capital and largest city of Antwerp Province, and the third largest city in [[Belgium]] by area at 208.22 km2 (80.39 sq mi) after [[Tournai]] and [[Couvin]]. It is the most populous municipality in [[Belgium]], and with a metropolitan population of over 1.2 million people, the country's second-largest metropolitan area after [[Brussels]].

title: arima_miyako
body:
A character mentioned briefly in [[Tsukihime]] and [[Kagetsu Tooya]], but became more prominent in [[Melty Blood]]. 

She is the oldest daughter of the Arima family, a branch of the Tohno family [spoiler]with very weak [[oni]] blood[/spoiler]. She became the adoptive little sister of a nine year old [[Tohno Shiki]] after he was sent to live with her family. She idolizes Shiki immensely but is too shy to express herself clearly to him. In Melty Blood, she resents the Tohno family for taking Shiki from her and plans to take him back by force. While she knows some Bajiquan, the [[Wallachia|Night of Wallachia]] phenomenon enhances her martial art powers to incredible levels. 

She wears a [[red jacket|red]] [[tangzhuang]], [[denim shorts|denim]] [[short shorts]] with [[cutoffs]] and dark [[blue socks]] with [[brown footwear|brown shoes]]. She has [[green eyes]] and wears [[red bow|red]] [[hair bow|bows in her hair]]s. Her design in [[Melty Blood: Type Lumina]], which represents the [[Tsukihime (remake)|remake]] timeline, changes some things of her design. Her brown shoes became [[pink footwear|pink]] and her denim shorts are now [[black shorts|black]] [[bike shorts]]. Her blue socks and red bows in her hair also became black instead.

These paddles were then used as cosplay props or to spank attendees, which wasn't always consensual.
These unconsensual spankings brought the yaoi paddles to infamy, which resulted in bannings and their consequent fading out.

title: nicepool
body: Wade Winston Wilson was a mercenary known as [[Deadpool]] who was banished to the Void. In the Void, Wilson went by the name Nicepool, as a way to distinguish himself from other Deadpools, and lived alongside his pet, Dogpool. Unlike most of his Variants, he did not possess any regenerative factor or superhuman powers, which led to his eventual death at the hands of his own Variants when another Deadpool used him as a shield for gunfire.

title: star_trek
body:
[b][i]Star Trek[/i][/b] is a legendary American [[science fiction]] entertainment franchise. 

The original Star Trek is a classic American [[science fiction]] TV series, created by Gene Roddenberry, which debuted in 1966 and ran for three seasons, following the interstellar adventures of Captain [[James Tiberius Kirk]] and the crew of the Federation Starship [[USS Enterprise]], following an earlier pilot film “The Cage,” which starred Jeffrey Hunter as Captain Christopher Pike. 

Following the release of other series in the franchise, the Kirk-headed series was retroactively referred to as "[[Star Trek: The Original Series]]". These adventures were continued by the short-lived Star Trek: The Animated Series and six feature films. The original series were influential in both the west and the east. In Japan it inspired the famous [[Uchuu Senkan Yamato]] classic anime series. 

Four more television series were eventually produced, based in the same universe but following other characters: [[Star Trek: The Next Generation]], following the crew of a new Starship Enterprise set a century after the original series; [[Star Trek: Deep Space Nine]] and [[Star Trek: Voyager]], set contemporaneously with The Next Generation; and Star Trek: Enterprise, set before the original series, in the early days of human interstellar travel. 

Four additional feature films were produced, following the crew of The Next Generation, and most recently a 2009 movie reboot of the franchise featuring the young crew of the original Enterprise set in an [[star trek: kelvin timeline|alternate timeline]]. 

The newest Star Trek television revival, beginning in 2017, includes the series [[Star Trek: Discovery]], [[Star Trek: Picard|Picard]], Short Treks, [[Star Trek: Lower Decks|Lower Decks]], Prodigy, and [[Star Trek: Strange New Worlds|Strange New Worlds]], streaming on digital platforms.

The franchise also includes dozens of computer and video games, hundreds of novels, as well as a themed attraction in Las Vegas (closed in September 2008). Beginning with the original television series and continuing with the subsequent films and series, the franchise has created a cult phenomenon and has spawned many pop culture references.

title: united_kingdom
body:
[b]The United Kingdom[/b] (UK), officially the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, is a country located off the north-western coast of continental Europe. The country includes the island of Great Britain, the north-eastern part of the island of Ireland, and many smaller islands.

The United Kingdom is a unitary state governed under a constitutional monarchy and a parliamentary system, with its seat of government in the capital city of [[London]]. It is a country in its own right and consists of four administrative divisions (or countries): [[England]], [[Northern Ireland]], [[Scotland]], and [[Wales]].

It is the country of origin of the [[english_text|English]] language.

title: spain
body:
A country in Western Europe. [b]Spain[/b] (pronounced /ˈspeɪn/ spayn; Spanish: [i]España[/i], pronounced [esˈpaɲa]), officially [b]The Kingdom of Spain[/b] (Spanish: [i]Reino de España[/i]), is a country and member state of the European Union located in southwestern Europe on the Iberian Peninsula. Its capital city is [[Madrid]].

Its mainland is bordered to the south and east by the Mediterranean Sea except for a small land boundary with the British Overseas Territory of Gibraltar; to the north by [[France]], Andorra, and the Bay of Biscay; and to the northwest and west by the Atlantic Ocean and [[Portugal]].
